question: Andy Jassy, who was making news recently, is the new CEO of which major technology company?
explanation:
Andy Jassy is to replace Jeff Bezos as Amazonâ€™s next chief executive officer. He is serving as the Chief of Amazon Web Services (AWS) at present.
Jeff Bezos had been the CEO of the Tech Giant for almost 30 years. He is to take up the role of Executive chairman. The billionaire entrepreneur is expected to focus on his space exploration company Blue Origin and other ventures.
